verses.plain: Now after this it came to pass, that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them, and took Gath and her towns out of the hand of the Philistines.

tokens.t: Now after this it came to pass, that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them, and took Gath and her towns out of the hand of the Philistines.

verses.plain: And he smote Moab; and the Moabites became David’s servants, and brought gifts.

tokens.t: And he smote Moab; and the Moabites became David’s servants,
brought gifts.

verses.plain: ¶ And David smote Hadarezer king of Zobah unto Hamath, as he went to stablish his dominion by the river Euphrates.

tokens.t: ¶ And David smote Hadarezer king of Zobah unto Hamath, as he went to stablish his dominion by the river Euphrates.

verses.plain: And David took from him a thousand chariots, and seven thousand horsemen, and twenty thousand footmen: David also houghed all the chariot horses, but reserved of them an hundred chariots.

tokens.t: And David took from him a thousand chariots, and seven thousand horsemen, and twenty thousand footmen: David also houghed all the chariot
, but reserved of them an hundred chariots.

verses.plain: And when the Syrians of Damascus came to help Hadarezer king of Zobah, David slew of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men.

tokens.t: And when the Syrians of Damascus came to help Hadarezer king of Zobah, David slew of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men.

verses.plain: Then David put garrisons in Syria-damascus; and the Syrians became David’s servants, and brought gifts. Thus the LORD preserved David whithersoever he went.

tokens.t: Then David put
in Syria-damascus; and the Syrians became David’s servants,
brought gifts. Thus the
preserved David whithersoever he went.

verses.plain: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadarezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.

tokens.t: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadarezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.

verses.plain: Likewise from Tibhath, and from Chun, cities of Hadarezer, brought David very much brass, wherewith Solomon made the brasen sea, and the pillars, and the vessels of brass.

tokens.t: Likewise from Tibhath, and from Chun, cities of Hadarezer, brought David very much brass, wherewith Solomon made the brasen sea, and the pillars, and the vessels of brass.

verses.plain: ¶ Now when Tou king of Hamath heard how David had smitten all the host of Hadarezer king of Zobah;

tokens.t: ¶ Now when Tou king of Hamath heard how David had smitten all the host of Hadarezer king of Zobah;

verses.plain: He sent Hadoram his son to king David, to enquire of his welfare, and to congratulate him, because he had fought against Hadarezer, and smitten him; (for Hadarezer had war with Tou;) and with him all manner of vessels of gold and silver and brass.

tokens.t: He sent Hadoram his son to king David, to enquire of his welfare, and to congratulate him, because he had fought against Hadarezer, and smitten him; (for Hadarezer had war with Tou;) and
all manner of vessels of gold and silver and brass.

verses.plain: ¶ Them also king David dedicated unto the LORD, with the silver and the gold that he brought from all these nations; from Edom, and from Moab, and from the children of Ammon, and from the Philistines, and from Amalek.

tokens.t: ¶ Them also king David dedicated unto the
, with the silver and the gold that he brought from all
nations; from Edom, and from Moab, and from the children of Ammon, and from the Philistines, and from Amalek.

verses.plain: Moreover Abishai the son of Zeruiah slew of the Edomites in the valley of salt eighteen thousand.

tokens.t: Moreover Abishai the son of Zeruiah slew of the Edomites in the valley of salt eighteen thousand.

verses.plain: ¶ And he put garrisons in Edom; and all the Edomites became David’s servants. Thus the LORD preserved David whithersoever he went.

tokens.t: ¶ And he put garrisons in Edom; and all the Edomites became David’s servants. Thus the
preserved David whithersoever he went.

verses.plain: ¶ So David reigned over all Israel, and executed judgment and justice among all his people.

tokens.t: ¶ So David reigned over all Israel, and executed judgment and justice among all his people.

verses.plain: And Joab the son of Zeruiah was over the host; and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, recorder.

tokens.t: And Joab the son of Zeruiah
over the host; and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, recorder.

verses.plain: And Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Abimelech the son of Abiathar, were the priests; and Shavsha was scribe;

tokens.t: And Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Abimelech the son of Abiathar,
the priests; and Shavsha was scribe;

verses.plain: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and the sons of David were chief about the king.

tokens.t: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada
over the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and the sons of David
chief about the king.

footnotes.text: Tibhath…: called in the book of Samuel Betah, and Berothai
had war: Heb. was the man of wars
Shavsha: also called Seraiah or Shisha
about…: Heb. at the hand of the king
